alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison, southeastern Cayuga, northern Cortland, northern Tompkins and northwestern Chenango Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Preble to Taughannock Falls. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Lansing, Homer, Virgil, Groton, Dryden, Preble, Scott, Truxton and Solon. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins
